text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Geez, It seems that I got into a terrible mess.
Mejiro McQueen's injury that I saw during training, it seemed to be deeper than I thought.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: From now on, I will have you look at it properly at the hospital, It seems that I have no choice but to give up on the “Takarazuka Kinen”.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san….

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please do not make such a dark face. “Takarazuka Kinen” is a pity, but I have a goal of winning 3 consecutive “Emperor Prizes”.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: To achieve the feat in this race that I love, I am now dedicated to healing my injury.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will not be able to train with Rice, but i'm sure the team will be able to help.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: eh, yeah….

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san and everyone, and I am also looking forward to your race in the Kyoto Shimbun cup.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And please show us why, we're going to have a hot race that's going to be exciting for us.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Got it…. Rice, I'll try running with all my power.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The rest will be enough to be accompanied by Trainer-san, Rice-san please return to training too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'll come to see you later.
I was impressed by the words of Mejiro McQueen, when Rice Shower returned to the course with a determined expression.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now Rice-san has the power to pull the team in a surprising way.
As Mejiro McQueen says, I feel that the effort that Rice Shower puts has a small effect on everyone around us.
choice_data_list:
Now you can concentrate on the treatment 
without worrying about her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I can't lose too. I have to work hard on my treatment.
In order to fill the gap Mejiro McQueen left from her injury, Rice Shower began training with the team uniting to help.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: heh….heh…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Follow, Follow…

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Rice-san, please follow me from here.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Follow, Follow…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: heh….heh, heeh…. Rice-san, It's really amazing…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your hard work. All of you, it seems to be a good training session.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: No seriously, my legs are shaking like a newborn baby goat.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You're not allowed to exercise, so be careful with your weight management, right? even yesterday, you had extra dessert after dinner.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You saw that!? That was, because the pudding tasted so good. I didn't do anything wrong!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well, leaving that matter aside, Rice-sans finish seems to have gotten better.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: McQueen and everyone on the team are there to do their best.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Same here, Rice-sans hard work has been encouraging.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, then! I will start running. You stay calm there!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ah!?…Geez, I know you are doing it on purpose because I can't run.
After that, the training continued as a team, and then.――

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: heh…. My heart is beating fast….

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I recommend you to enjoy that tension, Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Rice-san, you will be okay! you've been training all the time, haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Well, that's right I've worked so hard to get this far. Having fun, and then…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I will win, over Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Good! that's the spirit! that's the spirit!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: We will support you with all our might.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Well then, I'll go……!
choice_data_list: Go and win over Mihono Bourbon!
Go and win over Mihono Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Got it, Follow, Follow!
That day, Rice Shower who said “I want to win” in the ferris wheel.
The race to prove how straight and strong her feelings are is finally beginning!
